H

hand - Variable in class logicalComponents.Controller
The class which logically represents a human hand.
Hand - Class in logicalComponents
This class contains a collection of Joints which combined form a representation of the human hand.
Hand() - Constructor for class logicalComponents.Hand
Creates a new Hand instance, with the initial min and max positions for each Joint set to 0 and 255, respectively.
Hand(int, int) - Constructor for class logicalComponents.Hand
Creates a new Hand instance, with the initial min and max positions for each Joint set to 'min' and 'max', respectively.
handChanged(HandEvent) - Method in class deprecated.HandMeterdeprecated
 
handChanged(HandEvent) - Method in class graphicalComponents.HandGraph
 
handChanged(HandEvent) - Method in class graphicalComponents.HandMeter
 
handChanged(HandEvent) - Method in interface logicalComponents.HandChangeListener
This method is fired every time the state is changed in the Hand class.
handChanged(HandEvent) - Method in class logicalComponents.HandRecorder
The method overridden in the HandChangeListener interface.
HandChangeListener - Interface in logicalComponents
This is the interface all classes must implement if they wish to receive event notifications from the Hand class.
HandEvent - Class in logicalComponents
The class which holds information about the changes in state of the Hand class.
HandEvent(Object, JointName, double, int, int) - Constructor for class logicalComponents.HandEvent
Creates a new instance that has information about a particular Joint which has changed state.
HandGestures - Class in logicalComponents
This class contains an assortment of hand gestures that are used primarily by the Controller class to make the robotic hand gesture in a certain way.
HandGestures() - Constructor for class logicalComponents.HandGestures
 
HandGraph - Class in graphicalComponents
A component created which graphically displays all joints at the same time.
HandGraph() - Constructor for class graphicalComponents.HandGraph
 
HandGraph(int, int) - Constructor for class graphicalComponents.HandGraph
 
HandMeter - Class in graphicalComponents
This class is a component which displays the current state of a Hand.
HandMeter() - Constructor for class graphicalComponents.HandMeter
 
HandMeterdeprecated - Class in deprecated
 
HandMeterdeprecated(int, int) - Constructor for class deprecated.HandMeterdeprecated
 
HandMeterdeprecated() - Constructor for class deprecated.HandMeterdeprecated
 
HandRecorder - Class in logicalComponents
 
HandRecordPlayer - Class in logicalComponents
This class contains a collection of recordings which can be identified with a title.
HandRecordPlayer() - Constructor for class logicalComponents.HandRecordPlayer
Default constructor.
HOOKEMHORNS - Static variable in class logicalComponents.HandGestures
